articles.title: CES 2021: 'Tunable' spectacles adjust lens strength at turn of dial - Daily Mail
articles.description: Designers in San Francisco have created the VOY glasses, which change focus from -5 to +2 in a matter of seconds, eliminating the need to carry multiple pairs of specs with you.
articles.content: It's a struggle that many spectacle-wearers face on a daily basis, but the days of fumbling around for your reading glasses could soon be a thing of the past, thanks to a new pair of 'tunable' glasse… [+5045 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: OnePlus’ first wearable is a budget fitness tracker with two week battery - The Verge
articles.description: OnePlus has announced the OnePlus Band, its first fitness band which features heart rate monitoring, fitness and sleep tracking, and a battery life of up to two weeks. It works with Android at launch but not iOS.
articles.content: Available this week in India for about $34
